text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.G.DE44Test delayed to next contact or referredReason Hepatitis C test not done - Test delayed to next contact or referred
    HIV.G.DE45Stock-out or expiredReason Hepatitis C test not done - Stock-out or expired
    HIV.G.DE46Machine or technician not available or machine not functioningReason Hepatitis C test not done - Machine or technician not available or machine not functioning
    HIV.G.DE47Client declined / refused testReason Hepatitis C test not done - Client declined / refused test
    HIV.G.DE48Other (specify)Reason Hepatitis C test not done - Other (specify)

name: ReasonHepatitisCtestnotdoneCodes
title: Reason Hepatitis C test not done Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Reason Hepatitis C test not done element
